text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Trump’s MAGA results:
38,664 COVID-19 deaths and counting 
48,900 gun deaths and counting
732,197 COVID-19 cases and counting 
22 million unemployed and counting 
$2.4 trillion budget deficit and counting
$24.5 trillion national debt and counting
Making America Go Away (MAGA)
